column1: Uncontrolled data used in OS command
column2: Using user-supplied data in an OS command, without neutralizing special elements, can make code vulnerable to command injection.
column4: This argument to an OS command is derived from [["user input (a command-line argument)"|"relative:///main.c:11:27:11:30"]], dangerously concatenated into [["snprintf output argument"|"relative:///main.c:18:14:18:16"]], and then passed to system(__command).
